title: Tank Ekko
body: Can someone explain how a ekko who builds full tank do more damage than a nearly full build ahri? This is bs riot. Ekko builds full tank and nearly one shots our adc wtf

replies.body: They have tried to nerf it like patch after patch now but if you saw Hauntzer in the NA LCS, it is still crazy good. It is all because of his passive and the slows/stuns.

Thing is Ekko has all the best things to benefit a tank, all rolled into one Kit.

Slows (passive/Q), Stuns (W), Stickiness (Q+Iceborn+Passive means you never get away), Wall jumps (E) and Base damage (Ekko has this in spades)

And he even has a button to drop tower agro instantly if he dives too far (R)

He's never going to be balanced because riot don't want to kill AP ekko, and can't balance both at the same time (either AP Ekko exists and Tank Ekko is too strong, or AP Ekko is shit and Tank Ekko is balanced.)

Actually they just killed tank ekko. ive played a lot of ekko and i can say with certainty that you will not be seeing top lane ekkos anymore and if you do they will not be crushing lane like you would expect. ap ekko is now the only good ekko.

Honestly all the changes means is it is _slightly_ harder to stick to people if you manage to get caught in some CC.

Tank Ekko is still fine, just more actually balanced.

ekko is my main and i have almost 80,000 mastery with him. used to play a lot of tank ekko up until the most resent nerf. the nerf was too harsh in my opinion and i no longer enjoy playing him top lane because he simply doesn't win trades anymore. it can still be done but its like playing EZ the match is decided before the 5 min mark you either get a kill early or you loose lane all game.
His kit is fundamentally flawed. His kit is one of a bruiser but he was tuned to be like an assassin. They're fixing that a bit and its a lot better now, but there is still more they can do.
He is still strong asf. Ekko built full tank and one shot our fed adc even under turret.
